title: FS: A couple of Poor Tolstoi T206s SOLD!

posts.post_title: FS: A couple of Poor Tolstoi T206s SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Hello, friends. I would like to sell the following cards:

Ames: It does have some wet sheet transfer of the Tolstoi logo on it.

Burchell: I guess, the pics tell all!


Cards have been sold!  Thank you, Tony!

I'll take them Andy.

PM coming.
